Reproducible results for the synthesis of SiB
elemental boron and silicon required tightly pressed and
homogeneously dense pellets as well as precise control of the
sample temperature. Therefore, we performed investigations
into reaction temperatures and times in the well-controlled
environment of a thermal analysis apparatus.
